name: microcms-mcp-server
description: microCMSのMCP Serverです。LLMから直接コンテンツの取得や入稿ができます。

tools.name: microcms_get_list
tools.description: Get a list of content from microCMS with filtering and search capabilities

tools.name: microcms_get_list_meta
tools.description: Get a list of contents with metadata from microCMS Management API. Use ONLY when user message contains "メタ" or "メタ情報". Returns metadata like status, createdBy, updatedBy, reservationTime, closedAt, and customStatus.

tools.name: microcms_get_content
tools.description: Get a specific content item from microCMS

tools.name: microcms_get_content_meta
tools.description: Get a specific content with metadata from microCMS Management API. Use ONLY when user message contains "メタ" or "メタ情報". Returns metadata like status, createdBy, updatedBy, reservationTime, closedAt, and customStatus.

tools.name: microcms_create_content_published
tools.description: Create new published content in microCMS

tools.name: microcms_create_content_draft
tools.description: Create new draft content in microCMS

tools.name: microcms_update_content_published
tools.description: Update published content (full replacement) in microCMS

tools.name: microcms_update_content_draft
tools.description: Update draft content (full replacement) in microCMS

tools.name: microcms_patch_content_status
tools.description: Change content publication status in microCMS (Management API). Can change status between PUBLISH and DRAFT

tools.name: microcms_patch_content_created_by
tools.description: Change content creator in microCMS (Management API). Updates the createdBy field of a content item to a specified member ID

tools.name: microcms_get_api_list
tools.description: Get list of all available APIs (endpoints) from microCMS Management API

tools.name: microcms_get_member
tools.description: Get a specific member from microCMS Management API. Returns member information including ID, name, email, and MFA status

tools.name: microcms_delete_media
tools.description: Delete media files from microCMS (Management API). Supports deletion of both images and files

MICROCMS_SERVICE_ID.title: サービスID
MICROCMS_SERVICE_ID.description: 対象サービスのID。xxxx.microcms.io のxxxxにあたる部分です。

MICROCMS_API_KEY.title: APIキー
MICROCMS_API_KEY.description: microCMSの管理画面で発行したAPIキーです。
